channel.title: All my Brushes
channel.description:
*For PhotoShop CS2 and above
-Updated at July 25th; 10:53 PM - New swirl brushset
I began making brushes yesterday, and I wanted to post all I've made, which is 5 sets (6 If you count the single brush-one). If you use them in something you make, you don't [b]have[/b] to, but I'd appreciate it if you atleast mention you used them ^^
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?cmzxt1quteg]ButterFly Brush[/url] - 1
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?8dpwdtymidx]Cloud Brushes[/url] - 5
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dnty2ywzstz]Diamond Brushes[/url] - 10
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?fjg7zdyxymt]Random Shape Brushes[/url] - 5
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?f4w9bygdl3y]Square Brushes[/url] (My best) - 5
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?fxftmmbimsi]Swirl Brushes[/url] - 4
I wouldn't say they're [i]that[/i] good (Except the Butterfly and Square ones), but hey, I just started them yesterday. If any of the links are false or don't work, please tell me. I hope you like them!
~Lin

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Post all you want, it won’t make a difference. It’s sad for people to expect you to flame them or humiliate them, because you do it so much. I already knew you would post on here saying something bad about my brushes because no matter how stupid it is, you always find a way to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Lol oh well, you just won’t quit until you win will you ^^

That’s the only thing I copy and pasted, but I did make them and that’s all that matters.

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

OWNED PLS?

Lin:

copied em onto PS

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

No, I didn’t at all copy and paste anything, except for the blank squares which I used Paint for that (I made them on Paint and copied em onto PS), because PhotoShop’s straight line maker isn’t really good.

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

You did this, Copy, paste thats how its a copy n paste set.

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Miss? No. And copy and paste brush sets??? No. I took a picture of clouds from my house, and I even have the pic.

I removed all the crap around each cloud I wanted and made them in individual images.

And my tutorials weren’t TUTORIALS really, they were code snippets (Except a few -.-)

Also explain to me how they’re copy and paste brushes, I made all by hand.

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Too bad you didn’t make the cloud one, eh?
Miss copy n paste tutorial maker and now miss copy n paste brush sets?

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote="~R E B O R N~, post:3, topic:127018"]I downloaded the cloud one yesterday on codersx but never posted well anyways nice and how do you make brushes >.< lol.[/quote]Make a pic > Edit > Preset Manager > Ctrl + A > Delete (Be sure to save that whole set to get it back after you finish your brush set > Edit > Define Brush Preset > Brush tab thingy on the left > Drop down brush selector > Arrow in a circle button > Save Brushes or w/e and done.

Also thanks xD

Read full topic

item.title: All my Brushes

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

*For PhotoShop CS2 and above

-Updated at July 25th; 10:53 PM - New swirl brushset

I began making brushes yesterday, and I wanted to post all I’ve made, which is 5 sets (6 If you count the single brush-one). If you use them in something you make, you don’t have to, but I’d appreciate it if you atleast mention you used them ^^

ButterFly Brush - 1

Cloud Brushes - 5

Diamond Brushes - 10

Random Shape Brushes - 5

Square Brushes (My best) - 5

Swirl Brushes - 4

I wouldn’t say they’re that good (Except the Butterfly and Square ones), but hey, I just started them yesterday. If any of the links are false or don’t work, please tell me. I hope you like them!
